title: Mount Rushmore of the Formerly Fat
description:
We learned Kirk doesn't like guys who "look weird when they're skinny" (00:53:50). That includes Drew Carey, Randy Jackson & more. Alec Baldwin went to George Stephanopoulos but who would Mike go to if he killed someone? (00:02:32) Chris Cuomo was fired by CNN (00:03:01). Keith Olbermann has lost his mind again but we get his two-time 'Worst Person in the World' to react (00:16:30). Drew Magary makes a Barstool is racist joke and Toucher & Rich are loving it. Gerry's new advertiser is a podcast hosted by two of the wokest sports writers you'll find. Kenny G, Elf on the Shelf & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
